table_caption: Comparison of demographic variables between the groups from our cohort and the ADNI cohort.
table_foot: Note: Data are presented as means ± standard deviations. Primary cohort means our cohort; Validation cohort means the ADNI cohort; AD, Alzheimer's disease; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; NC, normal control; MMSE, Mini–Mental State Examination (MMSE); MoCA, Montreal Cognitive Assessment; t-test/χ2 means the statistics in the demographic variables comparisons between primary cohort and the ADNI cohort; * denotes a significant difference with a p value <.05.
